name: RNASeq_differential_analysis.pdf
abstract: Statistical aspects of Differential Expression Analysis (DEA) and experimental design for RNASeq
description: This material contains statistical theory behind DEA analysis (Normalization, modelling with DESeq2 or edgeR, data visualization), with experimental design aspects ; presented on the EBAII 2023 session
teaches: Basic statistical notions : confounding factors, interaction, hypothesis testing, replicates, sampling
Experimental design specificities in RNASeq (batches, technical variability)
Count data visualization and exploratory analysis
Count data specificities and normalization methods
keywords: Normalization, Experimental Design, Differential Expression Analysis
